data.text:
Established: 1991

Website: www.osu.cz

University of Ostrava was founded in 1991 and offers higher education at the Faculties of Philosophy, Education, Science, Social Studies, Medicine and Arts in many bachelor, master and post-graduate programs.

The University includes two research institutes, the Institute for the Research and Application of Fuzzy Modelling and the European Research Institute for Social Work. Appropriate place for intensive studying is the University Library.

University of Ostrava annually welcomes a big number of international students and is involved in exchange programs within EU, the USA and Vietnam.

The university is divided into these 6 faculties:

Faculty of Arts

Pedagogical Faculty

Faculty of Science

Faculty of Social Studies

Faculty of Medicine

Faculty of Fine Arts

Portal

Portal (portal.osu.cz) represents university information system which enables an easy access to study materials, timetables, lecturers, syllabi, examination, grades and credits, scholarship information. Your personal student number enables you to login and enter this extensive database which will make your life easier especially when it comes to exams and credit transfer.
